reference.title: summary
reference.shortdesc: The <summary> element contains a text summary associated with a book event (such as <approved> or <reviewed>) or with the list of copyrights for the book.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <bookchangehistory> <edited> <person>Joe T. Editor</person> <revisionid>1</revisionid> <completed><year>2008</year><month>03</month><day>15</day></completed> <summary>Added several new topics</summary> </edited> <edited> <person>Joe T. Editor</person> <revisionid>2</revisionid> <completed><year>2008</year><month>10</month><day>13</day></completed> <summary>Fixed a few typos</summary> </edited> </bookchangehistory>
